content: CPF AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Nov 2018What's your advise to a non Singaporean or PR and don't have CPF?What's your advice to achieve 1M without CPF?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Nov 2018The advice is essentially the same. Find a high interest and Low risk asset and use it to build up a financial safety net that on your retirement, you would have a sizable wealth waiting for you. Then sequentially build up your equity portfolio without the butterflies in your tummy affecting you when markets go on a roller coaster. Truth is, I canâ€™t find a financial safety net better than that of the CPF SA Account. The high return rate, the illiquidity (so that I can not touch it) and the stability cannot be rivalled by another other asset available in the market. 0 comments1
Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Nov 2018Learn how to invest! There are so many resources online, and on Seedly! Started learning and start investing!0 comments0

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 05 Nov 2018Raise your income and make sure you have a plan to save/invest a portion of your income? If you can save  $1,436.03 every month for 30 years, an investment that can give 4%, you will have $1million. There are many investment vehicles available, the key is whether one is disciple enough/able to to set aside the money.0 comments0
